description: This file defines an API endpoint for creating a checkout session in a food ordering backend, utilizing FastAPI and SQLAlchemy, and including logic for mock payment processing.

methods.name: create_checkout_session( payload: CreateCheckoutSessionRequest, session: AsyncSession = Depends(...), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Asynchronous function to create a checkout session, validate order ownership, and generate a mock checkout URL.

ctags.name: create_checkout_session
ctags.signature: ( payload: CreateCheckoutSessionRequest, session: AsyncSession = Depends(...), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
